scripts.dev:log: mkdir -p .xdg/.wrangler && WRANGLER_HOME=$PWD/.xdg/.wrangler DEBUG_HTTP_LOG=1 wrangler dev --port 8788 2>&1 | tee log.txt
scripts.db:update:local: mkdir -p .wrangler/local-logs .xdg/.wrangler && WRANGLER_HOME=$PWD/.xdg/.wrangler WRANGLER_LOG_PATH=$PWD/.wrangler/local-logs/wrangler.log wrangler d1 execute tapcanvas --file=./schema.sql --local
scripts.db:update:remote: mkdir -p .xdg/.wrangler && WRANGLER_HOME=$PWD/.xdg/.wrangler wrangler d1 execute tapcanvas --file=./schema.sql --remote
